findings.title: Incorrect Access Control
findings.description: The contract FLOKI2024 is importing an access control library @openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol but some functions (increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance) are missing the modifier onlyOwner.

findings.title: Unchecked Array Length
findings.description: If array.length is large enough, the function exceeds the block gas limit, and transactions calling it will never be confirmed.

findings.title: Outdated Compiler Version
findings.description: Using an outdated compiler version can lead to potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Public Functions Should be Declared External (gas)
findings.description: Functions should be declared as external to save gas.

findings.title: Costly Loop Operations (gas)
findings.description: Loops with a bigger or unknown number of steps can cause the complete contract to be stalled at a certain point due to gas constraints.
